table.sql: id, catg, forum, state, top_flag, elite_flag, reply_flag, topic, post_user_no, post_nick_name, gmt_post, visit_count, reply_count, reply_user_no, reply_nick_name, gmt_reply, style, title, '' AS content, gmt_create, gmt_modify

<where>
		<if test="id != null">
			AND id=#{id}
		</if>
		<if test="catg != null">
			AND catg=#{catg}
		</if>
		<if test="forum != null">
			AND forum=#{forum}
		</if>
		<if test="state != null">
			AND state=#{state}
		</if>
		<if test="topFlag != null">
			AND top_flag=#{topFlag}
		</if>
		<if test="eliteFlag != null">
			AND elite_flag=#{eliteFlag}
		</if>
		<if test="replyFlag != null">
			AND reply_flag=#{replyFlag}
		</if>
		<if test="topic != null">
			AND topic=#{topic}
		</if>
		
		<if test="postUserNo != null">
			AND post_user_no=#{postUserNo}
		</if>
		<if test="gmtPostBegin != null">
			AND gmt_post>=#{gmtPostBegin}
		</if>
		<if test="gmtPostFinish != null">
			AND gmt_post<=#{gmtPostFinish}
		</if>
		
		<if test="replyUserNo != null">
			AND reply_user_no=#{replyUserNo}
		</if>
		<if test="gmtReplyBegin != null">
			AND gmt_reply>=#{gmtReplyBegin}
		</if>
		<if test="gmtReplyFinish != null">
			AND gmt_reply<=#{gmtReplyFinish}
		</if>

		<if test="title != null">
			AND title LIKE #{title}
		</if>
		<if test="content != null">
			AND content LIKE #{content}
		</if>
	</where>
